MS MCQs

    Evaluate shifts in work patterns with the Business continuity dashboard in Microsoft Workplace Analytics

    »

    1. To prepare the Business continuity dashboard, which pre-defined queries do you need to run?

      Hourly Collaboration and Manager impact

      Business Continuity and Hourly collaboration

      Protect after hours and Business continuity

      Collaboration tracker and Teams Insights


    2. Which of the following insights are not presented in the Workplace Analytics Power BI Business continuity dashboard?

      How are collaboration activities changing?

      What are the impacts of work-life integration?

      Has time spent in documents changed?

      How can remote work effectiveness be improved?


    3. Which of the following opportunity categories to improve remote work effectiveness are presented in the Business continuity dashboard?

      Manageable work levels, Sustained working cadence, Work-life integration

      Work-life integration, Employee connectivity, Manager time in after hours

      Manageable work levels, Manager Guidance, Manager time in after hours

      Manager work levels, Manager Guidance, Manager time in after hours
